title: The Proletarian Revolution and the Renegade Kautsky
description: The present English translation of V.I. Lenin's The Proletarian Revolution and the Renegade Kautsky is a reprint of the text given in V.I. Lenin Selected Works, Foreign Languages Publishing House, Moscow, 1952, Vol. II, Part 2. The notes at the end of the book are based on those given in the Selected Works and in the Chinese edition published by the People's Publishing House, Peking, in September 1964.
author: Vladimir Lenin
